welcome_message_body: Welcome to Neuilly-sur-Seine, where charm and sophistication await you. Known for its elegant architecture, beautiful parks, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
